text: Joevana Charles (July 1955 - 17 January 2021) was a Seychellois politician. She was a member of the National Assembly of Seychelles. She was a member of the Seychelles People's Progressive Front. She was first elected to the Assembly in 1993. She retired in 2015. Charles died on 17 January 2021, aged 65.Seychellesâ€™ longest-serving woman parliamentarian dies; remembered as an adventurous patriot ==References== ==Other websites== *Member page on Assembly website Category:2021 deaths Category:1955 births Category:Seychellois politicians
title: Joevana Charles
